x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.potential_impact: This will shape future of enthusiastic rural students!
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Rural students need mentors! Many professionals want to contribute to education but don’t know how. This will enable weekly once connect with designated student. (one to one) Rural Government school students lack access to modern comprehensive learning and they might struggle to compete in the modern world. This will help give them a strong foundation in subjects like science and maths which are essential for higher education.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.project_name: Volunteer-Teach India - Connecting Volunteers to Rural Students
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

Unified portal to connect volunteers and students 

Campaigning under portal (to invite volunteers and students)

Weekly Teaching and Assesment plans (sprints can be used)

Trainings (Learning and Management under HRSD can be used)

 

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

No

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

To make sure volunteering continues throughout the academic year. (It shall not be discontinued with lack of interest from Volunteer/Student) So selection must be with specific criterias.
